title: nil:NilClass (NoMethodError) occurs If the spec file name is named as "bowling_rspec.rb" using JRuby
body:
# Steps to reproduce
- create a new file named bowling_rspec.rb and copy/paste the example rspec
  
  require 'bowling'
  
  describe Bowling, "#score" do
    it "returns 0 for all gutter game" do
      bowling = Bowling.new
      20.times { bowling.hit(0) }
      bowling.score.should == 0
    end
  end
- run it via _rspec bowling_rspec.rb_

D:\dev\bowling>rspec bownling_rspec.rb
F
